## Extension.styles() method

Allows extensions to register styles on the editor instance using emotion for dynamic styling.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
styles?(params: ExtensionManagerParams): Interpolation;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerParams</code> | extension manager parameters |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Interpolation`
